main event: Personnel from Medford Airways observed multiple shiny objects in the sky, varying in number from 1 to 7, between 12:00 PM to 12:30 PM on August 5, 1949.
interesting points: The objects were first sighted by personnel from Medford Airways and reported to Medford Tower,The objects were shiny and varied in speed from slow to very fast,Objects were seen maneuvering horizontally but not vertically,The sightings occurred at a very high altitude,The objects would appear and disappear intermittently while flying in formation.
